info: Give to the Beast Clergyman, found at Bestial Sanctum in the distant east, who collects and devours these roots.

name: Celestial Dew
info:
Allows you to carry out an Absolution at the Church of Vows.

Absolution causes anyone who was previously friendly towards you to forgive your violent transgressions towards them, if they're still alive.

name: Stonesword Key
info:
Breaks the seal on imp statues. Remains embedded in the statue after use, meaning it can only be used once.

Some imp statues require 2 keys to break the seal.

name: Academy Glintstone Key
info: Allows access to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

name: Carian Inverted Statue
info: Reveals the hidden form of the Carian Study Hall.

name: Irina's Letter
info: Irina requested this be given to her father, the commander of Castle Morne.

name: Drawing-Room Key
info: Allows access some of the rooms in Volcano Manor, including the drawing room.

name: Amber Starlight
info: Ingredient used in a special draught.

name: Spirit Calling Bell
info:
Possessing this allows you to summon spirits from ashen remains.

 

Only one type of spirit may be summoned at once.

name: Fingerslayer Blade
caption: The hidden treasure of the Eternal City of Nokron and symbolizes its downfall; a blood-drenched blade said to have been born of a corpse.
info: Proof of the high treason committed by the Eternal City.

name: Sewing Needle
info: Enables garb alterations from Boc.

name: Gold Sewing Needle
info: Allows demigod garb alterations from Boc.

name: Tailoring Tools
info: Enables garb alterations at sites of grace.

name: Seluvis's Potion
info: - Seluvis

name: Amber Draught
info: - Seluvis

name: Academy Glintstone Key
caption: A glintstone key will remember its user, meaning once used it can never be passed on to another. The academy does not welcome the indolent.
info: Allows access to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

name: Golden Tailoring Tools
info: Allows demigod garb alterations at sites of grace.

name: Discarded Palace Key
info: Opens a treasure chest passed down to Carian Princesses, found in the Grand Library of Raya Lucaria.

name: Iron Whetblade
info:
When applying an affinity using ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#F395C4">Heavy</font>
- <font color="#F395C4">Keen</font>
- <font color="#F395C4">Quality</font>

name: Red-Hot Whetblade
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or flame-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#F48C25">Fire</font>
- <font color="#F48C25">Flame art</font>

name: Sanctified Whetblade
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or golden-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#F5EB89">Sacred</font>
- <font color="#FFE033">Lightning</font>

name: Glintstone Whetblade
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or magic-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#57DBCE">Magic</font>
- <font color="#9DD7FB">Frost</font>

name: Black Whetblade
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or occult-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#40BF40">Poison</font>
- <font color="#C84343">Blood</font>
- <font color="#E0B985">Occult</font>

name: Beast Eye
info: Trembles when near Deathroot.

name: Weathered Dagger
info: Fia wishes for it to be returned to its rightful owner.

name: Memory Stone
info: Possessing this increases the number of available <font color="#E0B985">memory slots</font> by 1, allowing more spells to be memorized.

name: Talisman Pouch
info: Possessing this increases the number of available <font color="#E0B985">talisman slots</font> by 1, allowing another talisman to be equipped.
